author: .fjl
content: About ECDSA again, one problem I see with moving to a different account cryptosystem, is that moving all funds of a user account might not be possible so easily. We could already start preparing for the migration now by sketching out a protocol feature where an account can be named as the 'heir' of another account, i.e. you could sign a 'will' with your ECDSA key nand authorize a different address to act in the old one's place.

author: .fjl
content: The main issue is that people need to have fully completed their migration/will by the time ECDSA gets broken
